title: Secretary General meets with OSCE Secretary General
text: The Secretary General of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and National Community Abroad meets with the Secretary General of the Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe (OSCE), Ms Helga SCHMID.

The two officials reviewed the approach and programs developed within the OSCE in the context of its relations with the six Mediterranean partners, including Algeria. In this regard, they discussed their respective experiences to address the multidimensional challenges of security, including in the Euro-Mediterranean region, especially those related to the fight against terrorism and nuclear non-proliferation.
They have, therefore, highlighted the need to maintain the spaces of dialogue for the settlement of international crises, prevailing in the immediate environments of both Parties.
